CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 22, 1955, pg. 5 reads: "Victim's Pal Lives Here - R.C. Phar, a white man, who said he wants Cordice out of the neighborhood and if Cordice doesn't move, he'll make it so he has to, lives in this home after moving from the trailer shown in the picture at the bottom left. Phar's son and another boy were with Larry Helly, 13, of 3802 Foster Road. Saturday when Cordice fired a shotgun after the boys pelleted Cordice's window with small objects."
TitMainTitle: Single story house owned by R.C. Phar, Foster Road, North Versailles
